comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

I added a third monitor using an USB-HDMI adapter. Third monitor is left to main window, all screens 1600x1200.


Actual results:

When the Firefox window is moved to the 3. screen, there is no refresh inside the window. Same with Thunderbird, but other apps like Visual Studio shows no problem. Looks like the screen coordinates are outside what Firefox is expecting.


Expected results:

A refresh would be nice - now the 3. monitor is a no go area for Firefox/Thunderbird.
